response.overview: Seductive, flirtatious, always commanding, no one gives good show like the sultry sirens of Switchblade Symphony. Since their arrival nearly a decade ago, not a single band on the scene has been able to top the girls in terms of sheer originality & mesmerizing darkwave charm. With fans drooling over their Sweet Little Witches live CD in '03, it's clear now that was only the foreplay. This luscious visual scrap book is the payoff for all who long to see their favorite goth goddesses cast that glittery spell on stage once again. Enhanced by multiple angles & exotic locales, Tina, Susan & the rest of the coven invite you into their circle of sonic bliss.
response.title: Switchblade Symphony: Sweet, Live Witches
